content: crochet lip balm holder this is an easy crochet level project it is a very cute item the most ladies/girls can use the lip balm holder can be attached to many things such as yr keys bag clutch lanyard etc it is also a quick project which requires a very small amount of yarn not only that but is a gorgeaus gift for yr friends family members or even yourself so don t hesitate get yr supplies ready & come crochet with me this simple yet beautiful & practical lip balm holder yarn 4ply cotton crochet hook f/3 75mm peace & blessings lovelymiracle
